'''Reign of Serenity''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 3.3]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2022-12-27 18:00:00 &ndash; 2023-01-17 14:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Plane of Euthymia" [[Raiden Shogun]] ({{Electro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Thorny Benevolence" [[Rosaria]] ({{Cryo}}), "Mujina Ninja" [[Sayu]] ({{Anemo}}), and "Crowfeather Kaburaya" [[Kujou Sara]] ({{Electro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
